updates.title: Conversion attribution analysis report (Beta)
updates.description: The Conversion attribution analysis report is a new addition to the advertising workspace that provides customers with the ability to uncover the full value of their marketing channels across the entire customer journey.

updates.title: Improved web conversion management and reporting capabilities for Google Ads customers (Beta)
updates.description: More flexible web conversion management tools and new cross-channel reporting features are now available for marketers and advertisers.

updates.title: Cross-channel budgeting (Beta)
updates.description: The Google Analytics team is excited to announce the release of cross-channel budgeting. Use cross-channel budgeting to track performance and optimize paid channel investments.

updates.title: Auto-configured key events for lead generation Business objective
updates.description: Analytics now automatically configures qualified and converted leads events as key events when the Business objective for lead generation is selected in order to guide clients towards the recommended best-practices for lead gen measurement. Once conf

updates.title: Cost data import: expanded data sources (beta)
updates.description: Additional data sources are now supported for cost data import in open beta. With this enhancement, you are able to import cost data from multiple sources such as:

updates.title: Annotations now have Analyst+ permissions
updates.description: Users with Analyst and above Google Analytics permissions can now create, edit, and delete annotations.

updates.title: Item data import improvements
updates.description: Item data import now allows importing item-scoped custom dimensions into Google Analytics. This provides greater flexibility to import item data without the need for item IDs, particularly beneficial for users with extensive product catalogs. Learn m

updates.title: Default reports and suggested audiences for lead generation customers
updates.description: We’re launching new reports and suggested audiences dedicated to customers whose goal is to generate leads.

updates.title: Import cost data from Reddit Ads
updates.description: You can now import cost data from Reddit through a seamless integration with Google Analytics. This enables advertisers to automatically track Reddit cost data within Google Analytics. Learn more about importing cost data from Reddit Ads.

updates.title: Improved conversion data completeness
updates.description: We’ve improved conversion data quality to prevent under-reporting of conversions for Google Analytics customers whose properties have 2 or more linked Google Ads accounts, and who have opted to credit paid and organic channels for web conversions the

updates.title: Improved ecommerce data availability and usability
updates.description: We’ve improved ecommerce data (item-scoped dimensions and metrics) availability and usability.

updates.title: Import cost data from Snap ads
updates.description: You can now import cost data from Snap through a seamless integration with Google Analytics. This enables advertisers to automatically track Snap cost data within Google Analytics.

updates.title: Google Analytics linking recommendation in Google Ads
updates.description: Customers who link their Google Ads or Google Marketing Platform accounts to a Google Analytics property are correlated with a 23% increase in conversions and a 10% reduction in cost per conversion.

updates.title: Import cost data from Pinterest Ads
updates.description: You can now import cost data from Pinterest through a seamless integration with Google Analytics. This enables advertisers to automatically track Pinterest cost data within Google Analytics.

updates.title: New diagnostic in Google Analytics for User-ID implementation issues
updates.description: We’ve launched a new diagnostic to alert users of problematic User-ID implementations. Properties impacted by errors in user-ID implementation will see various diagnostic alerts throughout Google Analytics. The diagnostics include guidance on how to

updates.title: Benchmarking support for unnormalized metrics
updates.description: We've expanded the Benchmarking feature in Google Analytics to give you more ways to compare your performance against others in your industry.

updates.title: Import cost data from Meta and TikTok ads
updates.description: You can now import cost data from Meta and TikTok through seamless integrations with Google Analytics. This enables advertisers to automatically track Meta and TikTok cost data within Google Analytics.

updates.title: User-provided data new infra
updates.description: New User-Provided Data (UPD) infrastructure has launched, allowing new UPD customers to implement UPD without feature degradations. This improves UPD for Conversion and Customer Match. Early adopters on the old infrastructure may still see some degra

updates.title: User-provided data attribution improvement
updates.description: Google Analytics improved the user-provided data (UPD) feature for better data quality and behavioral attribution. UPD now focuses on activation and Ads Conversions, improving Enhanced Conversions and Customer Match Audiences, and ensuring more accur

updates.title: Cost data import is now Campaign data import
updates.description: Google Analytics is updating the name of the existing Cost data import feature to Campaign data import.

updates.title: Display dynamic remarketing in Google Analytics
updates.description: With display dynamic remarketing for web now available in Google Analytics, you can take Google Ads remarketing further by showing website visitors personalized ads that contain products and services viewed on your site.

updates.title: New suggested audience templates for customer lifecycle goals
updates.description: Google Analytics has launched two new suggested audience templates to allow customers to quickly create audiences for:

updates.title: Analytics Advisor
updates.description: We are excited to announce the launch of Analytics Advisor. This is an agentic conversational AI assistant, powered by Gemini models, that Analytics customers can evoke in the Google Analytics user interface whenever they have questions or need assis

updates.title: Header overrides
updates.description: You can specify in header name and secret header value in Content Analytics. This header overrides configuration ensures that Content Analytics sends custom HTTP headers to bypass any bot detection or gate traffic technologies you have implemented.

updates.title: Stitching in connections
updates.description: The stitching process in Customer Journey Analytics is now more simple. Instead of duplicating a dataset and applying stitching on the duplicated dataset, stitching is now done on the ingestion of data into Customer Journey Analytics, which removes the requirement of duplicated datasets and schemas.

updates.title: Combine data sources from multiple IMS orgs
updates.description: You can now use the Analytics Source Connector to combine multiple data sources from multiple IMS orgs. This allows organzations to have a combined view of their customer data, even when that customer data is spread across multiple IMS orgs. Note: This configuration is available only by submitting a

updates.title: Data storytelling: Generate slide presentations from Workspace reports
updates.description: You can now automatically generate a slide presentation (in .pptx format) that is based on an Analysis Workspace report. Workspace detects key insights in your report and converts them into stakeholder-ready slides. This feature reduces the time and effort required to surface findings, build executi

updates.title: Analyze audiences from Experience Platform Profile datasets in Customer Journey Analytics
updates.description: You can now ingest audience membership data from Experience Platform Profile datasets into a Customer Journey Analytics connection. Audiences become available as new dimensions for use in Analysis Workspace. This is made possible through a new capability in Customer Journey Analytics to ingest XDM o

updates.title: Analytics source connector: Search report suites in Experience Platform
updates.description: If you do have a high number of report suites you can now search for the report suite you want to connect to within the Analytics Source Connector dataflow workflow.

updates.title: Streaming media services: Support schedule data
updates.description: You can now upload scheduled data of past live Streaming Media content to more easily and accurately track viewership. The following are examples of live content that are supported with schedule data upload: Uploading schedule data allows you to track viewership data for individual programs that ran

updates.title: Support for data mirror
updates.description: With support for model-based schemas and change data capture (CDC) functionality for specific source connectors in Experience Platform, Customer Journey Analytics will be able to support data mirror functionality of data warehouse solutions like Snowflake, Azure Databricks, and Google BigQuery. Cont

updates.title: Real-time reporting
updates.description: Real-time reporting in Customer Journey Analytics displays and updates data and visualizations within one or more panels in Analysis Workspace in real time.

updates.title: Filter criteria included in line visualizations and sparklines
updates.description: Any search filter criteria that you apply to a freeform table filter is now always included in sparklines. In addition, you can include search filter criteria in any connected line visualization. You can configure line visualizations to include search filter criteria by selecting the sparkline in th
